long: Meaning: an "edge" or "extremity"; specifically (of a bird or army) a "wing", (of a garment or bedclothing) a "flap", (of the earth) a "quarter", (of a building) a "pinnacle".  Usage:   bird, border, corner, end, feather(-ed), × flying,   (one an-) other, overspreading, × quarters, skirt, × sort, uttermost part, wing(-ed).  Source: from "H3670";
